traits.name: Arcane Flicker
traits.desc: Instead of flying, the wyrm can teleport between locations by expending that much movement.

traits.name: Translucent Body
traits.desc: The wyrm has advantage on Stealth checks.

actions.name: Arcane Volley
actions.desc: The wyrm unleashes 2 jolts of arcane energy at one or two targets within 120 feet. These jolts automatically hit and deal 3 (1d4 + 1) force damage.
